name: Nobody Grooves like Cadenska Voldmirovna
description:
Cadenska Voldmirovna is a disco vampire. They're channelling groovy forces through a magical stained-glass-floor.

They're surrounded by the horrible minions of the dull masters, that seek to extinguish all that is funky.

They will survive... But how stylish will they be doing it?

Rack up combos with your sweet dance moves, light up the stained glass, and play to find out.

---

Use the arrow keys to attack in the pressed direction.

Hitting enemies with your disco thunder light up the successive rings of the stained glass floor.  The more rings are lit up, the more points you'll get, and the more damage you'll deal!

Share your high scores below!

---
